remarks: Closure of a non empty, finite sum of positive integers (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fsumnncl.an0 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
fsumnncl.afi $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumnncl.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. NN ) $.
fsumnncl $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. A B e. NN ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
